Text:
That said, to think it would go this smoothly...
Heheh.
...So this masquerade ball was a trap after all.
A trap? What do you mean?

This is a purge. This ball was merely an excuse to
gather the remnants of the Perv faction in one
place.

I mean, what's the point of a frivolous masquerade
ball in this crumbling Oriana?

Did you also start the rumors about the Owl and
Shadow?

Mentioning that name was enough to flush out the
remnants of the Perv faction.

The Owl is a fictitious entity I created using Rose
Oriana's lost mask. Heheh... Quite effective, wasn't
it?

We'll see about that. Did you think you could use
the Shadow Garden's name and not expect the real
thing not to show up?

It makes no difference, even if a spy from the
Shadow Garden infiltrated this event. I'll just
kill everyone who showed up here!

With Mordred and Perv gone, the Shadow Garden is
nothing more than a pawn to me now!
A pawn... Such misplaced hubris.

It's not hubris when it's a fact. Once the purge is
complete, I'll head to Vegalta. My subordinates will
quickly...clean up the rest.
I'm done listening... Who even are you people?!

There's no need for you to know. You'll soon be dead
anyway.
Huh? As if I'd die that easily!

You—library lady—you know who these people are,
don't you?

They are those plotting the resurrection of the
demon Diablos—members of the Cult of Diablos.
These are the people you were talking about...!

...It looks like we're out of time to chat.
Please step back.
You've got to be kidding. I'm fighting too!

(The demon Diablos, and a cult plotting its
resurrection... The more I hear, the less I
understand.)

(But one thing is clear... This woman is definitely
a member of the Shadow Garden.)
(And Cid is―)
Lost in thought before your death? How leisurely!
Here he comes!
Not bad...!

You're a talkative one. As for your abilities...
I won't be requiring the use of my hidden
technique.
Try to withstand this! If you can, that is!
...Don't underestimate me!
Oh? You're stronger than I expected.
Now it's my turn to attack! Haaahh!

Heheh... I see, your bark matches your bite, but...
you've only managed to strike my afterimage.
Wha—?!
Time to say goodnight!
Nghh...uh...
Lady Claire!
...Well then, you're up next.
Very well... What kind of death do you prefer?

(Protect Claire while defeating this man... I didn't
expect the mission to be this challenging―)
Heheh... Mind if I join in?
Huh...?

What, still conscious? If you'd stayed passed out,
you could've died painlessly.
I like watching, but I don't like being left out.

What the hell is that weapon...? A spear made of
blood...?!
(Lady Claire... No, that power belongs to...)
(Aurora the Calamity Witch...!)
Well then, shall we continue? If you look away...
Guargh...?!
...It'll be over in an instant.

(I couldn't even see the attack...! So, this is
Aurora's power...)

Ridiculous... There can't be an attack faster than
my sword!
It's pointless. You can't see my attacks coming.

Ugh...agh... Impossible... There's no way I can
lose!
He's...trying to Awaken.

Heheheh... Hyahahah! No one can stop me now!
You're all finished!
It seems I have one more job to do.
I'll assist you.

Alright, let's dance together. But...be careful not
to end up as collateral, okay?
